casebody.data:
John L. FERRELL v. NATIONAL GYPSUM COMPANY, a foreign corporation, and Hartford Accident & Indemnity Company, a foreign insurance corporation. No. 4725. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Sept. 12, 1953. Pete Farabi and J. P. Gendusa, Pitts-burg, Kan., for appellant. Hudson & Hudson, Fort Scott, Kan., for appellees.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and BRATTON and HUXMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed, on motion of appellant.
